Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to establishing a lithium-ion battery safety program
Summary: Provides that NYSERDA shall establish a program to provide rebates or reduced-cost exchanges for new lithium-ion batteries for powered mobility devices for certain individuals; provides that such rebates and exchanges shall cover no more than 55% of the cost of such batteries; sets standards for lithium-ion batteries provided pursuant to the program; requires NYSERDA to submit an annual report on such program.
LawCode: Amd ยง1854, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing a lithium-ion battery safety program
